descriptions.eld: Connect and manage your ELD providers

profile.title: Profile
profile.subtitle: Manage your profile settings
profile.photoHelp: Upload a clear photo to help your team recognize you
profile.addressNote: This address will appear on your invoices

fields.preferencesHelp: Share anything that helps us serve you better.

placeholders.preferences: e.g. preferred communication times, special requirements, etc.

completeProfile.title: Complete Your Business Profile
completeProfile.description: Add your phone number and company name to unlock professional invoicing. Your business address will appear on invoices you send to customers.

messages.failedToLoad: Failed to load your profile information. Please try again later.
messages.failedToUpload: Failed to upload profile image. Please try again.
messages.failedToRemove: Failed to remove profile image. Please try again.
messages.invalidImage: Please upload a valid image file (JPEG, PNG, GIF, or WebP)
messages.imageTooLarge: Image file must be less than 5MB

appearance.title: Appearance
appearance.subtitle: Customize how the app looks
appearance.themeDescription: Choose between light and dark theme for your dashboard
appearance.compactModeDescription: Reduce spacing for a denser layout
appearance.sidebarDescription: Customize which items appear in your sidebar and their display order.
appearance.sidebarTip: Drag items to reorder, use arrow buttons, or toggle visibility. On mobile, tap and hold the grip handle.
appearance.sidebarTipBox: Hidden items are still accessible via direct URL. Changes take effect immediately after saving.
appearance.unsavedChanges: You have unsaved changes. Don't forget to save!

account.title: Account
account.subtitle: Manage your account settings
account.clickToChangeEmail: Click the button to change your email address.
account.verifyNewEmail: You will need to verify your new email address before the change takes effect.
account.checkInbox: We've sent a confirmation link to
account.checkInboxInstructions: Please check your inbox and click the link to complete the email change.
account.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters long.
account.twoFactorDescription: Add an extra layer of security to your account
account.signOutDescription: Sign out from your current session on this device.
account.deleteAccountDescription: Permanently delete your account and all associated data. This action cannot be undone.
account.policyInfo: for information about data retention and your rights.
account.deleteWarning: This action cannot be undone. All of your data will be permanently deleted. Please type

messages.loadFailed: Failed to load your account information. Please try again later.
messages.passwordTooShort: New password must be at least 8 characters long.
messages.emailConfirmationSent: A confirmation email has been sent to your new email address. Please click the link in that email to complete the change. You may also need to confirm on your old email address.
messages.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address.
messages.sameEmail: New email must be different from your current email.
messages.emailRateLimit: Too many requests. Please wait a few minutes and try again.
messages.emailInUse: This email address is already in use by another account.
messages.deleteConfirmRequired: Please type 'delete my account' to confirm.
messages.sessionExpired: Session expired. Please log in again.

privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.subtitle: Manage your privacy settings

protectionList.encrypted: Your business data is encrypted and stored securely
protectionList.noSell: We never sell your personal information to third parties
protectionList.essentialCookies: We only use essential cookies required for the app to function
protectionList.stripePayments: Payment processing is handled securely by Stripe

privacy.emailPreferencesDescription: Choose what emails you want to receive from Truck Command. Transactional emails (invoices, password resets, security alerts) will always be sent.
privacy.productUpdatesDescription: Receive emails about new features, improvements, and tips for using Truck Command
privacy.promotionalEmailsDescription: Receive occasional emails about special offers and promotions
privacy.dataRightsDescription: Under the California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA), you have the right to access, download, and delete your personal data.
privacy.downloadDataDescription: Get a copy of all your data including loads, invoices, customers, expenses, and more.
privacy.deleteAccountDescription: Permanently delete your account and all associated data from our systems.
privacy.legalDocumentsDescription: Review our legal documents to understand how we collect, use, and protect your data.
privacy.privacyQuestionsDescription: If you have any questions about your privacy or how we handle your data, please contact us.

exportModal.title: Export Your Data
exportModal.plainJsonDescription: Unencrypted, readable by anyone with the file
exportModal.passwordWarning: Keep this password safe. You will need it to decrypt your data. We cannot recover lost passwords.
exportModal.plainWarning: Warning: Plain JSON files contain sensitive business data that anyone can read. Only use this if you understand the risks.

messages.loadFailed: Failed to load your privacy settings. Please try again later.
messages.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters long.
messages.exportEncryptedSuccess: Your encrypted data has been exported. Keep your password safe - you will need it to decrypt the file.
messages.exportPlainSuccess: Your data has been exported successfully!
messages.exportFailed: Failed to export data. Please try again or contact support.

notifications.title: Notification Preferences
notifications.subtitle: Manage how and when you receive notifications

deliveryChannels.title: Delivery Channels
deliveryChannels.description: Enable or disable notification channels globally

channels.smsDescription: Receive critical alerts via text message

compliance.name: Compliance & Documents
compliance.description: Document expiration alerts, compliance deadlines, and certification reminders

drivers.name: Driver Alerts
drivers.description: Driver license expirations, medical card renewals, and driver-related updates

loads.name: Load Updates
loads.description: Load assignments, status changes, and delivery notifications

ifta.name: IFTA & Tax Deadlines
ifta.description: IFTA filing deadlines, quarterly reminders, and tax-related alerts

maintenance.name: Maintenance Reminders
maintenance.description: Vehicle maintenance schedules, service reminders, and equipment alerts

fuel.name: Fuel Alerts
fuel.description: Fuel purchase reminders and fuel-related notifications

billing.name: Billing & Payments
billing.description: Invoice reminders, payment received, and billing updates

system.name: System Alerts
system.description: System errors, important updates, and general reminders

quietHours.title: Quiet Hours
quietHours.description: Pause non-critical notifications during specific hours
quietHours.enableDescription: Only critical notifications will be delivered during quiet hours

digest.title: Email Digest
digest.description: Choose how often you receive email notification digests

test.title: Test Notifications
test.description: Send a test notification to verify your settings are working correctly
test.tip: If you don't receive test notifications, check your spam folder or verify your contact information in

upgrade.quietHoursFleet: Set quiet hours to pause notifications during off-hours
upgrade.digestPremium: Control email frequency with daily or weekly digests

messages.loginRequired: Please log in to save preferences.
messages.tableSetup: Notification preferences feature is being set up. Please try again later.
messages.noEmail: No email address found for your account.
messages.noPhone: No phone number found. Please add your phone number in Profile Settings first.
messages.testEmailSuccess: Test email sent successfully! Check your inbox.
messages.testEmailFailed: Failed to send test email. Email service may not be configured.
messages.testEmailError: Failed to send test email. Please try again.
messages.testSMSSuccess: Test SMS sent successfully! Check your phone.
messages.testSMSFailed: Failed to send test SMS. SMS service may not be configured.
messages.testSMSError: Failed to send test SMS. Please try again.

sidebar.title: Sidebar Customization
sidebar.subtitle: Customize your dashboard sidebar
sidebar.description: Drag and drop to reorder. Toggle visibility for each menu item.

billing.title: Billing
billing.subtitle: Manage your billing and subscription

subscription.title: Current Subscription
subscription.upgradePrompt: Upgrade to keep your data and unlock more features

billing.keepPlanPrompt: Click "Keep My Plan" above to continue your subscription

paymentMethod.title: Payment Method
paymentMethod.trialPaymentPrompt: You'll be asked to provide payment details when your trial ends in
paymentMethod.subscribePaymentPrompt: You'll need to add a payment method when you subscribe to a plan.

history.title: Billing History
history.historyPrompt: Your invoice history will appear here once you've subscribed to a plan and made payments.

support.title: Need help with billing?
support.description: Our support team is available to assist you with any billing questions or concerns.

messages.loadFailed: Failed to load your billing information. Please try again later.
messages.portalSignIn: Please sign in again to access billing portal.
messages.portalError: Unable to open billing portal. Please try again.
messages.cancelSignIn: Please sign in again to cancel your subscription.
messages.cancelSuccess: Your subscription has been canceled. You will retain access until the end of your current billing period.
messages.cancelFailed: Failed to cancel subscription. Please try again.
messages.reactivateSignIn: Please sign in again to reactivate your subscription.
messages.reactivateSuccess: Your subscription has been reactivated! You will continue to be billed normally.
messages.reactivateFailed: Failed to reactivate subscription. Please try again.

eld.title: ELD Integration
eld.subtitle: Connect your ELD provider for automated data sync
eld.description: Connect your Motive or Samsara ELD device for automatic data synchronization

connection.title: ELD Connection
connection.noConnectionDescription: Connect your ELD device to automatically sync mileage, HOS logs, GPS locations, and vehicle diagnostics.
connection.selectProviderDescription: Choose your ELD provider to connect via OAuth

motive.name: Motive
motive.subtitle: (KeepTruckin)
motive.description: The #1 ELD provider with dedicated IFTA endpoints

samsara.name: Samsara
samsara.description: Leading fleet management with real-time GPS

iftaMileage.name: IFTA Mileage Sync
iftaMileage.description: Automatically import jurisdiction mileage for IFTA reporting

hosTracking.name: HOS Tracking
hosTracking.description: Monitor driver hours of service and compliance

gpsTracking.name: GPS Tracking
gpsTracking.description: Real-time vehicle location tracking on an interactive map

diagnostics.name: Vehicle Diagnostics
diagnostics.description: Monitor fault codes and receive vehicle health alerts

syncSettings.title: Sync Settings
syncSettings.automaticSyncDescription: Data is automatically synced every hour
syncSettings.webhooksDescription: Receive instant updates for critical events
syncSettings.contactSupport: Sync settings are optimized for your plan. Contact support for custom sync intervals.

dataSource.title: Data Source Preferences
dataSource.description: Choose primary data sources for IFTA reporting
dataSource.explanation: You can choose your preferred data source when generating IFTA reports:

eld.name: ELD Data
eld.description: Automatically imported from your connected ELD provider

manual.name: Manual Entry
manual.description: Trips and mileage entered via State Mileage Tracker

combined.name: Combined
combined.description: Merge ELD and manual data for complete coverage

dataSource.perReportNote: Data source can be selected per report in the IFTA Calculator.

help.title: Need Help with ELD Integration?
help.description: Connect your Motive or Samsara ELD device for automatic data synchronization. Connection uses secure OAuth and typically takes less than 2 minutes.

upgrade.title: Upgrade Required
upgrade.description: ELD integration requires Premium or higher plan
